column1: IF SOMETHING IS NOT MENTIONED, YOU DON'T HAVE TO DO IT
IF SOMETHING HAS THE SAME / NO ORDER, THE ORDER DOESN'T MATTER AS LONG AS YOU DO IT
"OPT" means there is some optional stuff with something useful especially for first characters of a league, but not strictly required for progressing through the act
